function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate pressurization leading to directional airflow issues and ineffective containment of pathogens","Impact":"Increased risk of pathogen spread and contamination between adjacent places","Mitigation":"Meticulous calculations, simulations, and close monitoring of pressurization systems to ensure effectiveness","Technologies":"Positive and negative differential pressurization systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, and workers in built environments","Owner":"Building managers and HVAC system engineers"},{"Description":"Uncertain health impacts of using silver nanoparticles to control pathogen viability","Impact":"Potential negative health effects on individuals exposed to treated environments","Mitigation":"Further research to assess the health impacts of silver nanoparticle usage","Technologies":"Silver nanoparticles for pathogen control","People":"Occupants, visitors, and workers in built environments","Owner":"Research institutions and health organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of negative health impacts from UVGI technology and bipolar ionization","Impact":"Potential harm to human skin and eyes from exposure to UVGI and ozone release from bipolar ionization systems","Mitigation":"Development of safety measures to minimize health risks, and further scientific research on potential health impacts","Technologies":"UVGI technology, bipolar ionization systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, and workers in built environments","Owner":"HVAC system engineers, research institutions, and health organizations"}]}
